item.description:
The Early Ford V8 Club guys that we do the Wings and Wheels show with are holding their 42nd annual car show at the airport on April 22nd. They have asked us to cook for their event.

On Saturday the 21st, we need to spend some time setting up so we are ready for Sunday morning. Please join me at 10am to help setup the food area!

We can meet at either Bullock Hanger or out on runway 20, just look for the crowd.

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: V8 Car Show Setup
